text: Today on the West Coast, itâ€™s a bit of a struggle with 3 ft @11s W and fresh 19 mph SSW winds creating a blown-out situation. Tomorrow looks much better, with 4 ft @11s W and lighter 10 mph SSW winds, making spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay prime for some fun sessions. Day after, conditions drop to 2 ft @8s W with fresh 25 mph SSW winds, keeping it poor across the board. Best: tomorrow.
